item.title: upgrade-mac-php-version.md
item.author: 1216062928@qq.com (Who)
item.description: mac 本地 php 版本较低，升级至 7.2 Upgrade update brew 如未安装 brew，参考 https://brew.sh/ 安装 brew update brew search php $ brew search php ==> Formulae brew-php-switcher php-cs-fixer phplint phpstan php php@7.1 phpmd phpunit php-code-sniffer php@7.2 phpmyadmin Install brew install php@7.2 安装完成之后，执行php -v 查
